title: Flying? Floundering? Failing? How would your club's report card read?
text:
Shattered dreams and lofty possibilities - it is quite amazing what 11 games of a Premier League season can reveal.

We asked our fan contributors and experts for an early-season report card and you can read about who's flying, who's floundering and what needs changing by selecting your chosen team below.

And when you get there, follow the page to get club news on your BBC Sport homepage - it's your team's page after all - and, if you're using our app, also hit the bell icon to sign up for news alerts about your side.
summary: Our Premier League fan writers give their verdict on your club's season so far.
